mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (member_id, member_name, password, nickName, email, country) VALUE (#{member_id}, #{member_name}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{country})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET member_name = #{member_name}, password = #{password}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, country = #{country} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, password, nickName, email, country, inserted, isAdmin FROM Member ORDER BY inserted DESC

SELECT b.*, m.nickName, m.isAdmin, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM FreeBoardFile WHERE fileId = b.board_id)) hasFile FROM freeBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id LEFT JOIN FreeBoardReply r ON b.board_id = r.board_id WHERE m.isAdmin = 1 GROUP BY b.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id DESC
SELECT * FROM freeBoard WHERE writer = #{member_id} ORDER BY inserted DESC
SELECT * FROM freeBoard WHERE writer = #{member_id} ORDER BY inserted DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT * FROM picBoard WHERE writer = #{member_id} ORDER BY inserted DESC
SELECT * FROM picBoard WHERE writer = #{member_id} ORDER BY inserted DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT r.*, f.title FROM FreeBoardReply r JOIN freeBoard f WHERE r.member_id = #{member_id} AND r.board_id = f.board_id ORDER BY r.inserted DESC;
SELECT * FROM FreeBoardReply WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY inserted DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT b.board_id AS board_id, b.file_name AS file_name, l.pic AS board FROM picBoardLike l JOIN picBoard b WHERE l.board_id = b.board_id AND l.member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY board

SELECT b.masterpiece_id AS board_id, b.file_name AS file_name, l.master AS board FROM likeTable l JOIN masterpiece b WHERE l.masterpiece_id = b.masterpiece_id AND l.member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY board

SELECT b.board_id AS board_id, b.file_name AS file_name, l.pic AS board FROM picBoardLike l JOIN picBoard b WHERE l.board_id = b.board_id AND l.member_id = #{member_id} UNION (SELECT b.masterpiece_id AS board_id, b.file_name AS file_name, l.master AS board FROM likeTable l JOIN masterpiece b WHERE l.masterpiece_id = b.masterpiece_id AND l.member_id = #{member_id} ) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0, 5
